import React, { useState } from 'react' function MenuConstructor({data}) { // receives data and constructs the table const [current,setCurrent] = useState("/") let page = document.URL let notDrink = page.slice(-5).toUpperCase() const nameField = page.endsWith("/")?"DRINKS":nameField return ( <> { data.map((item)=> ) }
{} Size Price (â‚¬) Add Remove
{item["name"]["S"]} {item["size"]["S"]} {item["price"]["N"]}
) } export default MenuConstructor
